subject: My name is Rosemary Ivan. I wr
body:
My name is Rosemary Ivan. I write to you from Ukraine because I am in
dire need of your help. As you must know, my city Donetsk where I have
lived for years, and now everything has been destroyed, including all
my family. My  granddaughter and I were saved by a miracle.
I want her to live a better life FAR AWAY from this madness and I need
your help to make it happen
. Fortunately, my husband managed to
deposit my family fortune in a security firm outside Marinka a city in
Donetsk. As I am old and weak, I need someone I can trust to receive
it and help my granddaughter start a new life, as she is all that is
left of our happy family, please i plead with a broken heart that her
safety is all that matters to me right now, as i am old and weak,
bullets or bomb can hit our camp any time and it doesn't matter
anymore,all i want is for my grandchild to leave this place and go far
away and start a new life.
I will give you more details when you reply and indicate your
acceptance to help me.
Many thanks to you in advance for everything.
Rosemary Ivan
Email: 
rosemaryivan1948@gmail.com

subject: Re: My name is Rosemary Ivan. I wr
body:
Hello Rosemary Ivan,

I'm really sorry to hear about your situation. It must be incredibly tough for you and your family. I can't even begin to imagine what you're going through right now.

You mentioned a security firm outside Marinka city in Donetsk where your family fortune is deposited. Could you tell me more about this? How did your husband manage to do that amidst all the chaos?

Also, how do you plan on getting your grandchild out of there? Do you have any specific plans or ideas in mind?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ann
